name: Cold Shift
storyline:
Everything is as boring as normal in the Boss Co supermarket. Barely any customers during one of the biggest blizzards of the decade.
The boss is about to close up shop early, until-

POW
Out go the lights!
BAM
A bonk injury is heard!

The lights flicker back to life... and...
SOMEONE HAS STOLEN ALL OF THE MONEY!!!
... and our boss it totally, like, injured !!!

With the police caught up in the snow, and the customers on their way out of the building, it's up to you and your totally-brave-and-fearless-leader Boss to crack this case before it thaws!
